Class KnowledgeBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • tweet.analyzer.core.KnowledgeBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class KnowledgeBase
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Knowledge Base class. Contains word vectors and IDF values from the reference corpus
    Author:
    TvPad

        public void computeIDFFromCorpusFile(java.lang.String corpusFile,
                                     boolean preprocess)
                              throws java.io.IOException
        Compute the IDF of all the words in the reference corpus
        Parameters:
        corpusFile - the reference corpus. Text file with one doc per line
        preprocess - preprocess the input if set to true
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

                                  throws java.io.IOException,

      • createFromFiles

        public void createFromFiles(java.lang.String corpusFile,
                            java.lang.String vectorsFile)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Create KB object from text files (corpus file and vectors file)
        Parameters:
        corpusFile - the file containing the reference corpus (text file with one line per document)
        vectorsFile - the file containing the vectorial representation of the words in the corpus (created with word2vec)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
